title: Oscilloscope Falling Edge (Code C00h to 400h)
summary: Scope capture of DAC output falling edge and zoomed residual after a code step from C00h to 400h.

structured_data.description: Annotations show falling edge at 2 V/div, zoomed falling edge at 100 uV/div, trigger pulse at 5 V/div, and timebase 5 us/div.
